data.prayer: Lord, to the people of West Equatoria you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Equatoria, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in West Equatoria, South Sudan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of West Equatoria, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help the 16,085 believers in West Equatoria to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Sere people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Sere people.
Lord, we pray for the believers in West Equatoria, South Sudan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of West Equatoria, South Sudan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of West Equatoria to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
